attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition was rejected recently about Jade Goody.
We are appalled at the publicity machine.
On one hand it creates masses of money.
On the other, we are sick and tired of faces every day blasted down our throats in the media.
This is one of societies biggest ills, it creates massive resentment, a website has sprung up to predict when Jade Goody will die, yes, sick, but inevitable.
So restrict the press on this issue, lets end the obsession with celebrity, worshipping them, then now watching them die.
Lets end the same faces manufactured to create money, and resentment.
The media IS responsible for many of societies ills, let the PM be strong and limit it in aspects that wouldn't restrict freedom to speak, but freedom to damage society, like celebrity culture.
End it now.
Make a law.
This IS what the PM is for to make society better.
Do it NOW.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
